alert.note: Alert for Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:46PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Teller and northwestern El Paso Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 246 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Divide, or 17 miles northwest of Colorado Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Woodland Park, Green Mountain Falls, Crystola and Chipita Park around 255 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft
